data.name: Giraffe and Annika Comic Book
data.detailed_description:
This is a comic book containing all of the comic scenes, alternate scenes, rejected scenes, and making-of scenes up through the ending of "Giraffe and Annika".
File format: PDF; full color 164p

How to View:
Right-click on "Giraffe and Annika" under "Manage" in the Library section of the Steam menu, then select "Browse Local Files". The files are contained in the "Giraffe and Annika Comic Book" folder.

data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 802 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750 Ti | AMD
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
